name: Indium Software
description:
Indium Software is a technology solutions company committed to deliver exceptional, customer-centric solutions across Big Data Enginnering & Analytics, Blockchain Development, independent QA and Gaming.
 
Our Digital Solutions focus on offering Big Data Engineering, Advanced Analytics, Blockchain Development and Product Development services. Our Big Data Solutions team also has expertise on Cloud environments on AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure and integration with Real-time data management solutions.
Our Independent Software Testing Services offers end to end testing across multiple domains , fostered by IP-led innovation. We are aggressively pursuing the social, mobile, cloud and IoT agenda to position testing solutions for several rapidly evolving digital transformation programs
Specializing in Game QA, we’ve tested over 150+ Game Titles and our Game Testing Studio comprises of 300+ Gaming Devices and 150+ Game Testers. We've been serving the who’s who of the gaming industry including the world’s largest gaming company and some of best emerging game-tech startups.
We operate through our registered offices in the Bay Area, New Jersey, Atlanta and Kuala Lumpur. Our Global Delivery Centers are located in in Bangalore and Chennai, India.
The core of Indium’s objective to servicing our global customers can be explained with this simple line: ‘We’re Small Enough to Care, Large Enough to Deliver.’ 
Indium has strong solutions competency in Banking, Technology, Healthcare, Lifesciences, Retail, Education and Gaming industries.
